H0.text: What was Cliff Richard's backing group called before they became The Shadows. The Drifters

H1.text: What was Cliff Richard's backing group called before they became The Shadows. The Wildcats

H2.text: What was Cliff Richard's backing group called before they became The Shadows. The Vipers

H3.text: What was Cliff Richard's backing group called before they became The Shadows. Rudy Ivan

A4.text: The Shadows (originally known as the Drifters between 1958 and 1959)

A5.text: The Shadows formed as a backing band for Cliff Richard under the name The Drifters
